components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: No Audio for Inbound/Outbound Calls via Japanese Toll-Free Numbers

incident_updates.body: Our engineers have identified the issue causing no audio on inbound/outbound calls to Japanese toll-free phone numbers and are working to deploy a fix. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Voice, APAC

incident_updates.body: We are observing no audio on inbound/outbound calls to Japanese toll-free phone numbers. We are currently working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Voice, APAC

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Orange Network in Cameroon

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Orange network in Cameroon. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Report Delays to AT&T Network in Mexico

incident_updates.body: We are observing recovery in delivery report delays to AT&T Network in Mexico. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Failures to Telcell Network in Zimbabwe for Non-OTP Messages

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience SMS delivery delays when sending non-OTP messages to Telecel Network in Zimbabwe. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to got a prompt resolution. We expect to have new updates by June 5 2023 at 14:50 Pacific time or as soon as more information becomes available.
